title: How to unmount SD card google pixel 3xl?
content: Supposed to find 'sd card'  in > 'settings' > 'storage' > 'storage settings (this is what I cannot find) > 'SD card' > 'unmount'...but I cannot find 'storage settings' to find the 'sd card' to unmount the card safely.  Can you pls advise?  Thank you!
